title: Did Christine Blasey Ford’s Brother Work with a Close Relative of Peter Strzok’s?
subtitle: Conspiracy theorists claim they've found 'three degrees of separation' between fired FBI agent Peter Strzok and Brett Kavanaugh's sexual assault accuser Christine Blasey Ford.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Christine Blasey Ford's brother, Tom Blasey, worked in the same company as a close relative (wife, sister, or sister-in-law) of former FBI agent Peter Strzok.
